attributes.action: Present a motion "That this House has no confidence in Her Majesty's Government"
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the gross mismanagement of the nations finances and ideologically driven governance of the Conservative Party I would like you to join me in debating this motion.

The evidence for the recall of a general election has never been more clear, what with a gapping hole in the Chancellors budget and a demonstrable lack of leadership from the front bench in all sectors. The situation of national governance is archaic & critically endangering national security. It is in need of complete reform.
attributes.background: The motion "That this House has no confidence in Her Majesty's Government" is to be called as to initiate a legal vote of no confidence as laid out in the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011.
